short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A bookmark tool for GitHub issue comments, compatible with Enterprise. It's secure as it only stores the pathname and comment ID.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A bookmark tool for GitHub issue comments, compatible with Enterprise. It's secure as it only stores the pathname(not include domain) and comment ID.
